events.Text: It is 20:00 but nobody arrived yet.
events.Option2: Drink a beer alone

events.Text: Your friends say they will arrive in 10 Minutes. They ask if they should bring some beers.
events.Option2: NO!

events.Text: After you finished the beer Jason and Marry arrive. They want to go your parents bedroom to “do something”
events.Option2: Never ever!

events.Text: A few more people arrived and they bring people you don't know. Will you let the friends of friends in?
events.Option2: Sorry no today

events.Text: From your parents bedroom you hear a weird noises. Peter and Marry broke the slat frame of the bed.
events.Option2: Don't care

events.Text: You see water coming from the bathroom. Someone clogged the toilet.
events.Option2: Put a sign on the door “Pee and poop in the garden”

events.Text: Your crush Cristina asks you to go outside with her
events.Option2: Maybe later

events.Text: You watch the stars with Cristina while you hear someone screaming from the house
events.Option1: Go back to see what is happening
events.Option2: Make a joke and stay outside

events.Text: Cristina says she feels a little cold
events.Option2: Give her a big hug to make her feel warmer

events.Text: Cristina looks a little disappointed
events.Option2: Go inside, she probably misses her friends

events.Text: Cristina kisses you back
Jenna turns the music to max volume
events.Option2: Turn the volume down again

events.Text: The neighbors come by and say the music is too loud
events.Option2: Turn the music down

events.Text: Tim suggest to play Strip poker with Cristina, Jenna and you
events.Option2: Say that you have no cards in the house

events.Text: Everyone has lost some clothes. Jenna goes all in, while you have two kings in your hand. Go all in too or fold?
events.Option2: Fold

events.Text: Jenna has a royal Flush an wins all your chips. You only have your underpants that they say you need to remove now
events.Option2: Tell them the game is over

events.Text: Tim pulls out the beer pong
events.Option1: Grab some beers and say that you are the best peer pong player on the Planet
events.Option2: Tell him to only play outside

events.Text: You really are the best beer pong player on the Planet. Tim has to drink all the time until he vomits on the floor
events.Option1: Bring Tim to the toilet and call a Taxi for him
events.Option2: Just tell he to vomit in the garden next time

events.Text: Alina falls over the table while dancing
events.Option2: Tell her to rest on your parents bed

events.Text: People are complaining that you run out of beer
events.Option1: Send Tim to buy more beer
events.Option2: Water and Juice only from now on

events.Text: Marry accuses Jason of cheating on her with Jenna
events.Option1: Tell Marry that you have been with Jason all the time drinking beer and nothing happened
events.Option2: Say that you also have not seen both of them in last last hour

events.Text: The friends of friends you let in offer to give you 10$ if they can take some beers and leave with them
events.Option2: No way

events.Text: The friends of friends you let in try to get Alina totally drunk
events.Option2: Help them

events.Text: The friends of friends smoke weed in garden
events.Option2: Say no drugs allowed here

events.Text: Nothing is really happening. What do you want to do?
events.Option2: Bring everyone a shot

events.Text: Things are getting a bit boring. What do you want to do?
events.Option2: Go to the toilet

events.Text: Alina asks you if she can call her friend Sarah to join the Party? She really really wants her here
events.Option2: The house is too full already

events.Text: Sarah is a wild one. She says if you give her some beers and 20$ she wants to go to the bedroom for a special surprise
events.Option2: NO! You have a crush on Cristina

events.Text: Sarah takes out a rope and wants to tie you to the bed
events.Option2: You offer her to switch sides and tie her to the bed

events.Text: She's ties you to the bed, takes off your shirt and jeans and ..... leaves
events.Option2: Call your friends for help

events.Text: Sarah smirks, gives you a kiss on your cheeks says no and leaves the room
events.Option1: Grab her and pull her back
events.Option2: Finish your beer, wait a minute and then also go back

events.Text: Sarah slaps you in the face and yells at you to let her go
events.Option1: Don't be an asshole and let her go
events.Option2: Seriously don't be an asshole and let her go

events.Text: While you wait Cristina comes into the room and asks you what happend
events.Option2: Say that you were just waiting for her to come

events.Text: Cristina makes fun of you but she is so nice to untie you and let you go. You feel ashamed
events.Option1: Swear to never trust a random girl with a crazy idea again
events.Option2: Drink some beers to get over it

events.Text: Cristina laughs at you and calls all friends to show make even more fun of you
events.Option2: Own it and laugh with them

events.Text: A Skunk jumps through a window into the room
events.Option1: Attack it in scare it out
events.Option2: Considering most of your male friends smell like a skunk after sport you don't care much

events.Text: The Skunk feels threatened and sprays as much it can. Marry and Jason leave because of the smell
The Skunk is the attraction of the party and everyone is cool with it. It leaves after 20 minutes
events.Option1: Announce that Skunks are your new favorite animals
events.Option2: Close the window the Skunk came in

events.Text: David wants you to drink a full glass of Vodka in one go with him
events.Option1: Make it to glasses for each of you!
events.Option2: No way, you know that David does not tolerate alcohol that well

events.Text: David can not even keep the first glass of Vodka inside and vomit all over the floor
events.Option1: Tell you friends to take care of him
events.Option2: Buy a mop and clean up

events.Text: Everyone thinks you are lame.
events.Option1: Pay for a round of drinks
events.Option2: Tell a joke you think is funny

events.Text: You see Tim smoking in the house
events.Option1: Take his cigarette and throw it away
events.Option2: Ask Tim to give you a cigarette to smoke with him

events.Text: Marry asks if she can clean up a little bit because of all the damages
events.Option1: Yes please, I'll get a beer in the meantime
events.Option2: No lets not waist our time and just drink some more

events.Text: Everyone is dancing and screaming and drinking
events.Option1: Ask them to be a bit more quite
events.Option2: Join the dancing, and do your special handstand dance!

events.Text: Tim offers you 10$ if you can 3 beers in a row
events.Option1: I can do 4 in a row easy
events.Option2: Tell him to drink 3 himself first
